price: Nokorε nso sε wͻ’hwehwεε sε wͻ hunahuna wo sε wͻ’betu wo afri asaase no so; (na sε εba saa mpo a wͻnso mmerε) tiaa bi na wͻ’de bεtena ase wͻ w’akyi
arabic: وَإِن كَادُواْ لَيَسۡتَفِزُّونَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لِيُخۡرِجُوكَ مِنۡهَاۖ وَإِذٗا لَّا يَلۡبَثُونَ خِلَٰفَكَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-in kādū layastafizzūnaka mina al-arḍi liyukh'rijūka min'hā wa-idhan lā yalbathūna khilāfaka illā qalīlan
